Source.Name: Boundary
Source.Description: Loads measured at calibration sites near the Canadian border

Source.Name: Canadian
Source.Description: Area of drainages located mostly in Canada (no calibration sites)

Source.Name: Atmos. Dep.
Source.Description: Average annual inorganic nitrogen (kg) atmospheric (wet) deposition for 1985 through 2001

Source.Name: Point Sources
Source.Description: Sum of total nitrogen loading from all point sources (2002).

Source.Name: Fertilizer
Source.Description: Sum total of Fertilizer Nitrogen from farms (2001).

Source.Name: West Forest
Source.Description: Area of forested land west of the Cascade divide.

Source.Name: East Forest
Source.Description: Area of forested land east of the Cascade divide.

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Loads measured at calibration sites near the Canadian border These loads were established as boundary conditions for the model. They represented the upstream contribution from Canadian land for which no geospatial data were available. This variable was used for monitored drainages only. Area of drainages located mostly in Canada (no calibration sites) This variable represented the upstream contribution from Canadian land for which no geospatial data were available. This variable was used for non-monitored drainages where more than 50% of the upstream area was in Canada. For non-monitored drainages where less than 50% of the upstream area was in Canada the geospatial data for the U.S. portion was extrapolated to the entire drainage. Average annual inorganic nitrogen atmospheric (wet) deposition (1985-2001) These estimates were based on data obtained from the National Atmospheric Deposition Program. Sum of total nitrogen loading from all point sources (2002) These estimates were based on data obtained from the US EPA and state water-quality permitting data bases. Sum total of fertilizer nitrogen from farms (2001) These estimates were based on data obtained from the USDA, NRCS, and USGS. Total manure loading of nitrogen (2001) These estimates were based on data obtained from the USDA, NRCS, and USGS. Area of developed land These values are from the National Land Cover Data Base. Area of forested land west of the Cascade divide These values are from the National Land Cover Data Base. Area of forested land east of the Cascade divide These values are from the National Land Cover Data Base. Basal area of alder forest These values were provided by the Landscape, Ecology, Modeling, Mapping and Analysis project Oregon State University.
